            你可能不知道的前端18个冷知识
            <!----> <!----></h1> <div class="author-info-block block-hidden" data-v-61fb5e44=""><div class="author-info-box" data-v-61fb5e44=""><div class="author-name" data-v-61fb5e44=""><a href="/user/694547078987287/posts" target="_blank" rel="" class="jj-link username username ellipsis" data-v-65b50b51="" data-v-292f6e48="" data-v-61fb5e44=""><span class="name" style="max-width:160px;" data-v-65b50b51="" data-v-292f6e48="">
    程序员小寒
  </span> <!----> <!----> <!----> </a></div> <div class="meta-box" data-v-61fb5e44=""><time datetime="2025-05-09T08:06:18.000Z" title="Fri May 09 2025 08:06:18 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)" class="time" data-v-61fb5e44="">
                    2025-05-09
                  </time> <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="read-icon" data-v-61fb5e44=""><path d="M7.90078 2.80078C4.49278 2.80078 1.74745 6.11672 0.800781 7.77469C1.74745 9.58339 4.49278 13.2008 7.90078 13.2008C11.3088 13.2008 14.0541 9.58339 15.0008 7.77469C14.0541 6.11672 11.3088 2.80078 7.90078 2.80078Z" stroke="currentColor" data-v-61fb5e44=""></path><circle cx="7.89922" cy="8.00078" r="2.2" stroke="currentColor" data-v-61fb5e44=""></circle></svg> <span class="views-count" data-v-61fb5e44="">

                  </span> <span class="read-time" data-v-61fb5e44=""><svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" data-v-61fb5e44=""><rect width="16" height="16" fill="none" data-v-61fb5e44=""></rect><circle cx="8" cy="8" r="5.65625" stroke="#8A919F" data-v-61fb5e44=""></circle><path d="M7.69141 5.18652V8.30924H10.8141" stroke="#8A919F" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" data-v-61fb5e44=""></path></svg>
                    阅读4分钟
                  </span> <!----></div></div> <div style="flex:1;" data-v-61fb5e44=""></div> <!----> <!----></div> <!----> <!----> <!----> <!----> <div id="article-root" itemprop="articleBody" class="main" data-v-61fb5e44=""><div class="article-viewer markdown-body result"><p>今天带大家盘点一下前端的一些冷知识。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-0">一、浏览器地址栏的妙用</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-1">1.1 可以执行javascript代码</h3>
<p>在地址栏中输入<code>javascript:alert('hello world')</code>，然后按回车键，会弹出一个提示框显示<code>hello world</code>。</p>
<blockquote>
<p>注意：如果直接把这段代码复制到地址栏，浏览器会删除掉前面<code>javascript:</code>（比如谷歌浏览器、edge浏览器等），需要自己手动加上。</p>
</blockquote>
<p>还可以使用<code>location.href</code>和<code>window.open</code>来执行它。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js">location.<span class="hljs-property">href</span> = <span class="hljs-string">"javascript:alert('hello world')"</span>;
<span class="hljs-variable language_">window</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">open</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"javascript:alert('hello world')"</span>);
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-2">1.2 可以运行html</h3>
<p>在地址栏中输入<code>data:text/html,&lt;div&gt;hello world&lt;/div&gt;</code>，然后按回车键，会显示一个包含<code>hello world</code>的div元素。</p>
<p>利用这个能力，我们可以把浏览器标签页变成一个编辑器。</p>
<p><code>contenteditable</code>属性能把一个元素变成可编辑的，所以我们如果在地址栏中输入<code>data:text/html,&lt;html contenteditable&gt;</code>，就可以把页面直接变成一个编辑器了。你还可以把它收藏到书签，以后直接点击就可以打开一个编辑器了。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">二、把整个在线网页变成可编辑</h2>
<p>只需要在浏览器控制台中输入这样一行代码，就能把整个页面变成可编辑的。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span>.<span class="hljs-property">body</span>.<span class="hljs-property">contentEditable</span> = <span class="hljs-string">'true'</span>;
</code></pre>
<p>这样我们就能随便修改页面了，比如修改页面中的文字、图片等等，轻松实现修改账户余额去装逼！</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">三、利用a标签解析URL</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> a = <span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">createElement</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>);
a.<span class="hljs-property">href</span> = <span class="hljs-string">'https://www.baidu.com/s?a=1&amp;b=1#hash'</span>;
<span class="hljs-variable language_">console</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">log</span>(a.<span class="hljs-property">host</span>); <span class="hljs-comment">// www.baidu.com</span>
<span class="hljs-variable language_">console</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">log</span>(a.<span class="hljs-property">pathname</span>); <span class="hljs-comment">// /s</span>
<span class="hljs-variable language_">console</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">log</span>(a.<span class="hljs-property">search</span>); <span class="hljs-comment">//  ?a=1&amp;b=1</span>
<span class="hljs-variable language_">console</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">log</span>(a.<span class="hljs-property">hash</span>); <span class="hljs-comment">// #hash</span>
</code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-5">四、HTML的ID和全局变量的映射关系</h2>
<p>在HTML中，如果有一个元素的id是<code>a</code>，那么在全局作用域中，会有一个变量<code>a</code>，这个变量指向这个元素。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">id</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"a"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span><span class="xml">
  console.log(a); // <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">id</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"a"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p>如果id重复了，还是会生成一个全局变量，但是这个变量指向的是一个<code>HTMLCollection</code>类数组。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">id</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"a"</span>&gt;</span>a<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">id</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"a"</span>&gt;</span>b<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span><span class="javascript">
  <span class="hljs-variable language_">console</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">log</span>(a); <span class="hljs-comment">// HTMLCollection(2)&nbsp;[div#a, div#a]</span>
</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-6">五、cdn加载省略协议头</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span> <span class="hljs-attr">src</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"//cdn.xxx.com/xxx.js"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p>src的值以//开头，省略了协议，则在加载js时，会使用当前页面的协议进行加载。</p>
<p>如果当前页面是<code>https</code>则以<code>https</code>进行加载。
如果当前页面是<code>http</code>则以<code>http</code>进行加载。
如果当前页面是<code>ftp</code>则以<code>ftp</code>进行加载。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-7">六、前端的恶作剧：隐藏鼠标光标</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">style</span>&gt;</span><span class="css">
  * {
    <span class="hljs-attribute">cursor</span>: none <span class="hljs-meta">!important</span>;
  }
</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">style</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p>直接通过css把光标隐藏，让人哭笑不得。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-8">七、文字模糊效果</h2>
<p>前端文本的马赛克效果，可以使用<code>text-shadow</code>实现。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">style</span>&gt;</span><span class="css">
  <span class="hljs-selector-class">.text</span> {
    <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: transparent;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">text-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#111</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">5px</span>;
    user-select: none;
  }
</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">style</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span>hello<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">span</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"text"</span>&gt;</span>world<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">span</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p>效果如下：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/84ece7621e584b4893a1e2e60628555b~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5bCP5a-S:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753401988&amp;x-signature=uRh5xtLwlWTc%2BKTWRGH3VrArsbw%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-9">八、不借助js和css，让元素消失</h2>
<p>直接用DOM自带的<code>hidden</code>属性即可。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">hidden</span>&gt;</span>hello world<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-10">九、保护隐私</h2>
<p>禁用<code>F12</code>快捷键：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">addEventListener</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'keydown'</span>, <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">e</span>) =&gt;</span> {
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (e.<span class="hljs-property">keyCode</span> === <span class="hljs-number">123</span>) {
    e.<span class="hljs-title function_">preventDefault</span>();
  }
})
</code></pre>
<p>禁用右键菜单：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">addEventListener</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'contextmenu'</span>, <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">e</span>) =&gt;</span> {
  e.<span class="hljs-title function_">preventDefault</span>();
})
</code></pre>
<p>但即使通过禁用<code>F12</code>快捷键和右键菜单，用户依然可以通过其它方式打开控制台。</p>
<ol>
<li>通过浏览器菜单选项直接打开控制台：比如 <code>chrome</code>浏览器通过 <code>菜单 &gt; 更多工具 &gt; 开发者工具</code> 路径可以打开控制台，<code>Firefox/Edge/Safari</code> 等浏览器都有类似选项。</li>
<li>用户还可以通过其它快捷键打开控制台：</li>
</ol>
<ul>
<li>Cmd+Opt+I (Mac)</li>
<li>Ctrl+Shift+C (打开检查元素模式)</li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-11">十、css实现三角形</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">style</span>&gt;</span><span class="css">
  <span class="hljs-selector-class">.triangle</span> {
    <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20px</span> solid transparent;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">border-top-color</span>: red;
  }
</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">style</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"triangle"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-12">十一、为啥 a === a-1 结果为true</h2>
<p>当<code>a</code>为<code>Infinity</code>无穷大时，<code>a - 1</code>的结果也是<code>Infinity</code>，所以<code>a === a - 1</code>的结果为<code>true</code>。</p>
<p>同理，<code>a</code>的值为<code>-Infinity</code>时，此等式也成立。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> a = <span class="hljs-title class_">Infinity</span>;
<span class="hljs-variable language_">console</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">log</span>(a === a - <span class="hljs-number">1</span>);
</code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-13">十二、数字的包装类</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-variable language_">console</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">log</span>(<span class="hljs-number">1.</span><span class="hljs-title function_">toString</span>()); <span class="hljs-comment">// 报错</span>
<span class="hljs-variable language_">console</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">log</span>(<span class="hljs-number">1.</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">toString</span>()); <span class="hljs-comment">// 正常运行 输出字符串'1'</span>
</code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-14">十三、防止网站以 iframe 方式被加载</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-variable language_">window</span>.<span class="hljs-property">location</span> !== <span class="hljs-variable language_">window</span>.<span class="hljs-property">parent</span>.<span class="hljs-property">location</span>) <span class="hljs-variable language_">window</span>.<span class="hljs-property">parent</span>.<span class="hljs-property">location</span> = <span class="hljs-variable language_">window</span>.<span class="hljs-property">location</span>;
</code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-15">十四、datalist的使用</h2>
<p><code>datalist</code> 是 <code>HTML5</code> 中引入的一个新元素，它用于为<code>&lt;input&gt;</code>元素提供预定义的选项列表。就是当用户在下拉框输入内容时，浏览器会显示一个下拉列表，列表的内容就是与当前输入内容相匹配的 <code>datalist</code> 选项。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">input</span> <span class="hljs-attr">list</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"fruits"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"fruit"</span> /&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">datalist</span> <span class="hljs-attr">id</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"fruits"</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">option</span> <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"苹果"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">option</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">option</span> <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"橘子"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">option</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">option</span> <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"香蕉"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">option</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">datalist</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p>效果如下：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/b3dd496262b14c79b2eba99e0cdc3dd3~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5bCP5a-S:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753401988&amp;x-signature=gD5D8SlGa4zShli%2ByU3zOOk2vcw%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-16">十五、文字纵向排列</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">style</span>&gt;</span><span class="css">
  <span class="hljs-selector-class">.vertical-text</span> {
    <span class="hljs-attribute">writing-mode</span>: vertical-rl;
    <span class="hljs-attribute">text-orientation</span>: upright;
  }
</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">style</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"vertical-text"</span>&gt;</span>文字纵向排列<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p>效果如下：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/837cbbc862ed4af09f9c7095838acbe4~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5bCP5a-S:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1753401988&amp;x-signature=cDue8qo8eo%2BuO9aOPAEH9X3ocjY%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-17">十六、禁止选中文字</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span>.<span class="hljs-title function_">addEventListener</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'selectstart'</span>, <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">e</span>) =&gt;</span> {
  e.<span class="hljs-title function_">preventDefault</span>();
})
</code></pre>
<p>效果跟使用 css 的 <code>user-select: none</code> 效果类似。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-18">十七、利用逗号，在一行中执行多个表达式</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> a = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> b = <span class="hljs-number">2</span>;
(a += <span class="hljs-number">2</span>), (b += <span class="hljs-number">3</span>);
</code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-19">十八、inset</h2>
<p><code>inset</code>是一个简写属性，用于同时设置元素的 <code>top</code>、<code>right</code>、<code>bottom</code> 和 <code>left</code> 属性</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.box</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">right</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">bottom</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
}
</code></pre>
<p>可以简写成：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.box</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  inset: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
}
</code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-20">小结</h2>
<p>以上就是前端的18个冷知识，希望大家看完都有所收获。</p></div></div>
